extendedInfo.description: Swap and morph any two faces you want in seconds! Download Face Switch to see what you and your partnerâs child might look like, check out yourself with a new haircut, or just mash together random faces into a mix of the two for hilariously entertaining results today!â  FEATURES  â â The first Android face changing app that lets YOU mix faces the WAY you want!â Soft change 'brush' stroke technology for realistic results.â Automatic in-photo face detection technology.â Intuitive touch based swipe controls.â Multiple picture importing options: deviceâs camera, photo roll or picture gallery.â Easy switch functionality.â Four portrait photo catalog pre-loaded right into the app.â Flexible photo sharing.â Skin color matching functionality.â Image adjustment: brightness, contrast, saturation and many more.â Free fantastic photo filters.â Free stickers.â Sleek user friendly interface with well-polished look and feel.â  FOR PURCHASE  â â Full Face Switch gallery - 16 portraits.â Great VIP gallery.â Photo filters.â Fun stickers.An innovative new recreational photo editing app from Code Hero, Face Switch has everything users need to swap and mix various people portrait photos together whenever they want, and for whatever reason they can come up with! The app itself is incredibly easy and intuitive to use: users simply pick the two pictures they want to swap and Face Switch does most of the leg work. To mash together faces users simply swipe to blend the facial regions theyâd like to morph. â  TIP  â â¢ Face Switch works best with front face photos!â  NOTE  â â¢ This app is ad-supported.If you think this application can be more fun or there is any trouble with it then do not post any negative review just mail us at support@face-switch.com and we'll try to improve this application as soon as possible.Follow Face Switch - Swap and Morph on:Google+:   http://gplus.to/FaceSwitchFacebook: http://facebook.com/FaceSwitchTwitter:      https://twitter.com/face_switchSite:           http://www.face-switch.com

reviews.title: Love it, but
reviews.comment: Wish u would make it so that u can use the hole picture, it crops the picture too much a lot and wish u would add a color chart or something to make it easier to match face colors, other than that, it still deserves 5 stars, great job, keep up the good work!!!
reviews.author: scott kline

reviews.title: Wow! I thought you had something here!!
reviews.comment: Apparently in order to use this app you have to pay for every effect and sticker with real cash...i can do the same thing for free at a rite aid photo lab.
reviews.author: Alexandria Maguire

reviews.title: I like it, works well and is good fun.
reviews.comment: I think they have done a great job and put a lot of thought into it.
reviews.author: Paul Geo

reviews.title: Best app!
reviews.comment: Amazing app! Soo much fun can\'t stop laughing! Way better than the other face swapping apps.
reviews.author: Matt Ramirez

reviews.title: Fun to play with
reviews.comment: Pretty cool application, at first I was confused how to use my own pics,  but after 2 minutes I figured out and I was ready to mix some of my family members faces. User friendly interface easy to use. Even  my 3 year old can do it... so why can\'t you? Thanks for app great job guys;)
reviews.author: Andrzej Klasa

reviews.comment: Very fun and convenient. A little confusing when you first use it, so some text would be nice, but other than that it\'s superb!
reviews.author: JJR202

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: Could\'ve made it easier to get the two faces started. Like add and subtract.

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: But I can turn my hole face in a super star body
